title: Teaching Your Child to Cut Out Distractions
itunes:author: Guest: Jonathan McKee
itunes:summary:
Our culture is saturated with distractions. Many parents are asking, "How can I get my child to focus on real-life instead of a screen?" John and Danny share how you can encourage your child to put away distractions and focus on things that matter. Featuring Jonathan McKee.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive Jonathan's book "The Guy's Guide to Four Battles Every Young Man Must Face" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-02-22?refcd=1332303

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/teaching-your-child-to-cut-out-distractions/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/championing-your-son-through-his-battles-digital-product?refcd=1332303

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
